'''"Riding the Inferno"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Riding the Inferno" is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|30|x=160}}.
